p: Five ECM fungal species dominated in both treatments: Cenococcum geophilum, Lactarius rufus, P. involutus, P. olivaceum, and T. terrestris ( Table 2). Most of these species were detected in all tree species and together accounted for 50.1% in the NEX plots and 51.7% in the EXT plots. The potential of these species to form mycorrhizal networks differed only for the case of P. involutus, which was absent in EXT on Norway spruce.
